segments.advisor_message: Alright, so let’s talk about your address. Just to clarify, um, what’s the postal code or ZIP code for your place? I understand that helps us, right?
segments.client_message: Uh, yeah, it’s, um, 12345. But, um, I don’t own the place, I’m renting it, you know? Like, just to be clear.

segments.advisor_message: I see, so you're renting. That’s good to know. And can you tell me the street name of your rental? Right? Just so we have that down.
segments.client_message: Oh, um, sure! It’s, uh, Maple Street. And, um, I’ve been living there since, like, uh, last year in June.
